channel.title: CVE Feed for PHP Factory -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PHP Factory -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-5615|2024-08-04T08:39:24.031Z -- php%20factory -- %5Bcalendar01%5D%20and%20%5Bcalendar02%5D
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in [Calendar01] free edition ver1.0.0 and [Calendar02] free edition ver1.0.0 allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2020-5616|2024-08-04T08:39:24.038Z -- php%20factory -- %5Bcalendar01%5D%2C%20%5Bcalendar02%5D%2C%20%5Bpkobo-news01%5D%2C%20%5Bpkobo-vote01%5D%2C%20%5Btelop01%5D%2C%20%5Bgallery01%5D%2C%20%5Bcalendarform01%5D%2C%20and%20%5Blink01%5D
item.description: [Calendar01], [Calendar02], [PKOBO-News01], [PKOBO-vote01], [Telop01], [Gallery01], [CalendarForm01], and [Link01] [Calendar01] free edition ver1.0.0, [Calendar02] free edition ver1.0.0, [PKOBO-News01] free edition ver1.0.3 and earlier, [PKOBO-vote01] free edition ver1.0.1 and earlier, [Telop01] free edition ver1.0.0, [Gallery01] free edition ver1.0.3 and earlier, [CalendarForm01] free edition ver1.0.3 and earlier, and [Link01] free edition ver1.0.0 allows remote attackers to bypass authentication and log in to the product with administrative privileges via unspecified vectors.
